title: VA Assistant
job_overview:
Looking to pay $8 to $12 per hour, 4 to 6 hours per week. Potentially more hours if your range of skills allow.

I am a digital course creator preparing to launch my second course. I am looking for someone with knowledge in the following applications:
Kajabi: Must have experience. Most of the work required will be in Kajabi. Setting up email sequences, creating sales pages, offers, landing pages, thank you pages, Setting up courses, uploading content. 

WordPress: If you are skilled with Upgrade to see actual info websites this is a huge bonus but not necessarily right away. Would love to have someone to upload blog posts, add pages from Kajabi, Update menu, and update posts for SEO optimization.

Canva: Canva skills are a must. I need someone to build workbooks for my course, handouts, lead magnets.

Additional skills that could lead to more hours:
Video editing and Social Media content creation. I use Descript.
Graphic design using Canva. I would love to find someone to help me create graphics and images for my courses, landing pages and blog posts on  the Wordpress sight. 

In your email tell me what is your favorite way to spend your free time? 

Looking forward to hearing from you!
